thread.title: James Rodriguez China transfer talks intensify as agent Jorge Mendes meets Tianjin Quanjian president
thread.title_full: James Rodriguez China transfer talks intensify as agent Jorge Mendes meets Tianjin Quanjian president

author: James Whaling
title: James Rodriguez China transfer talks intensify as agent Jorge Mendes meets Tianjin Quanjian president
text:
Sport James Rodriguez China transfer talks intensify as agent Jorge Mendes meets Tianjin Quanjian president Rodriguez has been linked with a move away from the Bernabeu after struggling for first-team football under Zinedine Zidane this season Share Rodriguez has been linked with a move to China (Photo: Getty Images Europe) Share Get Real Madrid CF updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Talk of James Rodriguez's potential transfer to the Chinese Super League has intensified after agent Jorge Mendes was pictured with Tianjin Quanjian president Shu Yuhiu. 
Rodriguez has been linked with a move away from the Bernabeu after struggling for first-team football under Zinedine Zidane this season. 
While the manager and player have both dismissed reports he could depart the Spanish capital, some reports have speculated there could be interest from the cash-rich league in the Far East. 
Hebei Fortune rejected claims they had made a £95million bid for Rodriguez earlier this week. The Colombian has struggled for first-team football under Zinedine Zidane (Photo: Real Madrid via Getty) Rodriguez strikes against Sevilla (Photo: AFP) 
But Mendes being snapped alongside the owner of Tianjin Quanjian has once again raised questions as to whether the Colombian could swap La Liga for the Chinese Super League. 
Rodriguez cost Real Madrid £63million in 2014 from AS Monaco but has fallen down the pecking order since Zidane became manager. Read More Transfer news LIVE: Arsenal, Liverpool, Manchester United and Chelsea latest from the January window 
Chelsea and Paris-Saint Germain have also been linked with moves for Rodriguez. 
Jadson, Luis Fabiano, Jackson Martinez, Ricardo Carvalho and Axel Witsel are among Mendes' clients to seal a big-money switch to China. poll loading Will James Rodriguez be a Real Madrid player at the start of next season? 1000+ VOTES SO FAR
